title: Technology-Enhanced Personalized Learning Design Strategies in Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of secondary science education and experience in utilizing digital tools
context.additional_context: Targeting secondary science teachers, emphasizing personalized learning design competencies in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments

learning_goals: Learners can curate science content tailored to their characteristics using technology-based diagnostic tools.
Learners can design personalized feedback strategies through AI-based recommendation systems and data analysis.
Learners can develop personalized learning pathways for project-based assessments in online environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
